text:
Pursuant to Charter Section 
16.111, the Board has the power by ordinance to grant any Person a Franchise, or renew, extend, transfer, or amend a Franchise, to authorize use of the Public Rights-of-Way to provide service. This 
Chapter 11 sets forth the procedural and substantive rules the Board will apply in exercising this power. Nothing in this Chapter may be deemed or construed to compel the grant of a Franchise. 
(Added by Ord. 58-00, File No. 000198, App. 4/7/2000)
